name: Format\Intro
description: The component for adding introductory text.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to display in the article, including any formatting tags depending on the format property.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of all the additions that should be applied to ranges of the component's text.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.

properties.name: behavior
properties.description: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An array of text components that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The formatting or markup method applied to the text.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: An optional unique identifier for this component. If used, this identifier must be unique across the entire document. You will need an identifier for your component if you want to anchor other components to it.

properties.name: inlineTextStyles
properties.description: An array of InlineTextStyle objects that you can use to apply different text styles to ranges of text. For each InlineTextStyle, you should supply a rangeStart, a rangeLength, and either a TextStyle object or the identifier of a TextStyle that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: style
properties.description: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: An inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a ComponentTextStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
